types:type.name: Json-metadata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Json_metadata = {| employeeID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, employeeStatus: String, employeeName: String, Address: {| code: String, pin: Number {"typeId": "int"}, road: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"employeeID\\\":100,\\\"employeeStatus\\\":\\\"India\\\",\\\"employeeName\\\":\\\"ABC\\\",\\\"Address\\\":{\\\"code\\\":\\\"A\\\",\\\"pin\\\":90809,\\\"road\\\":\\\"cvzxcx\\\"}}"}

types:type.name: inputJSON
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type inputJSON = {| source: String, caseType: String, Fname: String, Lname: String, phone: String, email: String, dob: String, nationalID: String, nationalIdType: String, Address: {| streetAddess: String, city: String, state: String, postal: String, country: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"source\\\":\\\"Hospital 1\\\",\\\"caseType\\\":\\\"-ve\\\",\\\"Fname\\\":\\\"Amita\\\",\\\"Lname\\\":\\\"Gupta\\\",\\\"phone\\\":\\\"5769098\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"a@gmial.com\\\",\\\"dob\\\":\\\"1993-08-16\\\",\\\"nationalID\\\":\\\"234-2421-133\\\",\\\"nationalIdType\\\":\\\"SSN\\\",\\\"Address\\\":{\\\"streetAddess\\\":\\\"nxjcn 9n8n kxsdf\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"nokha\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"bihar\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"79876\\\",\\\"country\\\":\\\"India\\\"}}"}
